author: igv4321
body:
#### PR description:
This PR updates Hcal local reco modules so that they use ESGetToken instead of ESHandle for fetching event setup data. A few other minor changes were also made, mostly improving code readability.

All code modifications are pure maintenance. No changes in the relval results expected.

#### PR validation:
The usual runTheMatrix tests were run.
title: Hcal event setup tokenize
